mission.title: AP Statistics 2021: Focus on Inference
mission.driving_question: How can we apply the principles of statistical inference to analyze and interpret data?

tasks.task_description: Identify and state the null and alternative hypotheses for the given scenario. Also, identify the appropriate hypothesis test.

tasks.task_name: Verifying Conditions and Calculating Test Statistic
tasks.task_description: Verify the conditions for the test identified in the previous task. Calculate the value of the test statistic and the corresponding p-value.
Based on your calculations, draw a conclusion for the test identified in the first task.
Respond to additional questions or scenarios based on the initial problem context.

pre_thinking_prompts: What does a null hypothesis represent in a statistical test?
What is the significance of the alternative hypothesis?
How can we calculate the test statistic and p-value for a given data set?
What factors should we consider when drawing conclusions from our statistical analysis?
mission.reflection_prompt: Reflect on the process of conducting a statistical test. What did you learn about the principles of statistical inference?
ai_tutor_prompts: Remember to clearly define your null and alternative hypotheses.
Ensure you've correctly identified the appropriate statistical test for this scenario.
Consider the implications of your p-value when drawing your conclusion.
mission.remix_zone: Consider a different scenario or data set. How would your hypotheses and conclusions change?
